name: Jousting eggs OUYA anniversary edition
description:
Beta Version 

A retake on the classic arcade game joust but in 3D with eggs. Use the joystick to move around. The idea is to bump into the other eggs being slightly higher and then they break releasing a smaller egg. There is also a 2 player coop mode if a second joystick is plugged in but 2 player mode is currently disabled

(joystickbuttons overview)

MENU 

a help

b play

x exit   

GAME

a toggles music

x exits back to menu
